headline: Erdogan: ISIS prime suspect in deadly Turkish wedding blast
content: By Steve Visser, Tim Hume and Isil Sariyuce, CNNUpdated 1139 GMT (1939 HKT) August 22, 2016 Gaziantep, Turkey (CNN)Hakki Okur's family was searching hospitals for him Sunday morning after an explosion at a Kurdish wedding in Turkey killed at least 53 people.CNN's  Steve Visser wrote and reported from Atlanta, Tim Hume wrote and reported from London, and Isil Sariyuce and Ben Wedeman reported from Gaziantep. Ralph Ellis, Mary Kay Mallonee, Jamie Crawford and  Joel Williams also contributed to this report.
